alert.note: Alert for Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 3:26AM PST until February 22 at 8:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Owens Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Periods of blowing dust may also occur resulting in lowered driving visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Occasional surges of gusty west winds could reach Highway 395 at times creating hazardous crosswinds for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
